verbs.description: [ARG0: The North Korean official] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to recommend pulling out of the proposed summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
[ARG0: The North Korean official] threatened to [V: recommend] [ARG1: pulling out of the proposed summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
The North Korean official threatened to recommend [V: pulling] out [ARG1: of the proposed summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
The North Korean official threatened to recommend pulling out of the [V: proposed] [ARG1: summit] between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
